title: Leveled up and didn't get my glorious champion capsule
body: So I hit level 70 and it told me that I got a glorious champion capsule but when I checked my loot it never showed up. Anything I can do about that?

replies.body: Hey grats on your progress!! :D  There's no huge milestone capsule yet, but you're close.  The next one will be at 75 per [this post.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/BQed8FWz-leveling-and-rewards-improvements-to-milestone-emotes-capsules-fwotd)
